MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL57 postcode area of Bangor, affecting properties in Vaynol Park and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:00PM due to needing to remove a tree from the electrical line. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:00PM on 14th February 2021.
